name: FeeProvider
description: FeeProvider contract. Implements calculation for the fees applied by the protocol.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: initializes the FeeProvider after it's added to the proxy.

functionDecorators.name: calculateLoanOriginationFee
functionDecorators.description: calculates the origination fee for every loan executed on the platform.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: can be used in the future to apply discount to the origination fee based on the _user account (eg. stake AAVE tokens in the lending pool, or deposit > 1M USD etc.).
